data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Kiphire, Nagaland, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kiphire, Nagaland, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Kiphire. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Kiphire to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Kiphire, Nagaland, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Loi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Loi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Loi people is yours.
Spirit, make the church in Kiphire, Nagaland, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Kiphire
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Kiphire, Nagaland, India.
